html:
Get ready for the Fall 2024 anime season with over 60 shows to look forward to, every week!

Welcome to the best way to discover new anime, and stay on top of their schedules across many different streaming services.

Jiiiii empowers you to stare your favorite shows down, so you can stay up to date with every show that's coming out this season.

• Have access to a live updating schedule showing when we expect new episodes to get released.
• Jump right into the app that streams the shows you follow.
• Take a high level look at all the shows airing this season.
• Share your favorite episodes and series with your friends or on social media.
• Search to quickly find the show or episode you are looking for.
• Sync your watch history across all your devices.

Want more? With a Jiiiii Membership, you can also tailor your own personal queue, merging them all into one place no matter the service. You'll also get access to new episode notifications, and past seasons as we add them.

Jiiiii Membership is an auto-renewing subscription that is offered at $3 per month or $36 per year, and a higher tier for Supporters that helps support indie development offered at $15 per month or $180 per year.

• If you choose to participate in a subscription plan, payment will be charged to your Apple ID account at the confirmation of purchase.
• The subscription automatically renews unless it is canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.
• Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period.
• You can manage and cancel your subscriptions by going to your account settings on the App Store after purchase.
• All purchases are final. We cannot issue refunds for purchases charged to your Apple ID.

Please see our Terms of Service (https://jiiiii.moe/terms) and Privacy Policy (https://jiiiii.moe/privacy) for more information regarding auto-renewing subscriptions.

Jiiiii does not stream anime, and requires an external streaming subscription on a compatible app to watch shows. Show information such as titles and thumbnails belong to their respective copyright owners, and their use is in accordance with the fair use doctrine of the U.S. copyright statute.

What’s New

The fall season is here, and with over 60 shows to look forward to, Jiiiii-chan gets a new look to match the season!

What's New:
• Added new fall-themed icon and membership screens.
• Added a leave a review link to settings.

Queue Management:
• Fixed an issue where delayed episodes would stick around in the queue.

Timeline:
• Updated release processing in attempt to fix timeline flashing when the app was open for a long period of time.

Fixes:
• Improved contact and follow options in settings.
• Fixed a regression where membership sheets were not resizable.
• Fixed a crash that could occur 10 minutes after creating an account.

Ratings and Reviews

App Privacy

The developer, Mochi Development, Inc., indicated that the app’s privacy practices may include handling of data as described below. For more information, see the developer’s privacy policy.

Data Not Collected

The developer does not collect any data from this app.

Privacy practices may vary, for example, based on the features you use or your age. Learn More
